name: VPS
description:
ğŸ’ Egg: VPS
âš™ï¸ Version: 2.1
â“ What is it: A VPS, this egg uses Proot (FakeRoot) which tricks the system saying that you are a superuser, installing a Pterodactyl inside another Pterodactyl has never felt so real!

â€¢ It is in no way recommended to use Root in Docker. I am not responsible for any damage/action that you will do with it.
 â€¢ â€¢ At least 1GB of space is required
 â€¢ Debian/Ubuntu distributions may take more than 15min to finish installation
 â€¢ Ubuntu distributions are currently not working

ğŸ› Bugs fixed/changelogs:
 â€¢ (1.0) Release. 
 â€¢ (2.0) Detects whether the Egg is up to date or not.
 â€¢ (2.0) Possibility to change Linux Distribution: (Debian, Ubuntu, Alpine). 
 â€¢ (2.0) Updated arguments, now the system is not so restricted.
 â€¢ (2.0) Possibility to change arguments.
 â€¢ (2.0) Run Shutdown command, now it is not necessary to kill the server anymore.
 â€¢ (2.0) Startup fix is needed, now the Panel knows that the Server is on.
 â€¢ (2.0) Installation Script has been rebuilt
 â€¢ (2.1) Serious Script bugs fixed
 â€¢ (2.1) Possibility of switch root between: PRoot(Default), PRoot-rs, FakechRoot + FakeRoot.
 â€¢ (2.1) Clean Install Added

ğŸ“ New Variables â€¢ (2.0) Your Arguments
 â€¢ (2.0) Linux Distribution
 â€¢ (2.1) â€¢ (2.0) ) Change Root
 â€¢ (2.1) Clean Install?
